name: Helicopter Flight Training, Inc.
about: Helicopter Flight Training, Inc., located at Long Island MacArthur Airport in Ronkonkoma, New York, has been a leader in helicopter flight training for over 30 years. We offer comprehensive programs for individuals seeking careers in aviation, including charter, EMS, firefighting, external load, and tour operations. Our experienced instructors, with both military and civilian backgrounds, provide hands-on training from private pilot to ATP levels. Our fleet, maintained to the highest standards in our Robinson Service Center, includes Robinson R-22's and R-44's, ensuring safe and reliable aircraft. We pride ourselves on providing a real-world training environment that keeps our students safe and in demand. Contact us to book an introductory flight and start your path to a great career in aviation.
